text.div:
Hepatitis B Virus Infection (Tests for hepatitis B virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    11258-1 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Units/volume] in Serum
    16934-2 Hepatitis B virus polymerase DNA [Presence] in Blood by NAA with probe detection
    20442-0 Hepatitis B virus DNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum by Probe with signal amplification
    23869-1 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Mass/volume] (viral load) in Serum by Probe
    29610-3 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    29615-2 Hepatitis B virus DNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    29900-8 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Mass/volume] (viral load) in Serum by Probe with signal amplification

    32686-8 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Mass/volume] in Serum
    33629-7 Hepatitis B virus sequencing [Identifier] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    33633-9 Hepatitis B virus precore TAG [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    40459-0 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Serum by Probe with signal amplification
    42322-8 Hepatitis B virus S+pol gene [Identifier] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    42595-9 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Units/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    43279-9 Hepatitis B Virus YMDD [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    45161-7 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    47216-7 Hepatitis B virus DNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe and target amplification method detection limit = 200 copies/ml
    48398-2 Hepatitis B virus DNA [log units/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by NAA with probe detection
    48650-6 Hepatitis B virus DNA [#/volume] (viral load) in Serum or Plasma by Probe and target amplification method detection limit = 500 copies/mL
    49357-7 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Units/volume] (viral load) in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    49358-5 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Units/volume] (viral load) in Bone marrow by NAA with probe detection
    49359-3 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Bone marrow by NAA with probe detection

    49361-9 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Log #/volume] (viral load) in Tissue by NAA with probe detection

    49368-4 Hepatitis B virus DNA [Units/volume] (viral load) in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    49600-0 Hepatitis B virus DNA [log units/volume] (viral load) in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    49601-8 Hepatitis B virus DNA [log units/volume] (viral load) in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    49602-6 Hepatitis B virus DNA [log units/volume] (viral load) in Bone marrow by NAA with probe detection
    49606-7 Hepatitis B virus DNA [log units/volume] (viral load) in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
